reg_pit.title: Commissioner for Taking Affidavits for British Columbia Fee Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 57/2011, effective April 1, 2011.

section.sectiontext: A fee of $30 shall be paid to the Crown in right of the Province by a person who is appointed pursuant to sectionÂ 56 of the Evidence Act to be a commissioner for taking affidavits for British Columbia.
